code: import axios from"axios";const apiUrl="https://xyz-9nky.onrender.com/api/tasks";export function getTasks(){return axios.get(apiUrl);}export function addTask(task){return axios.post(apiUrl,task);}export function updateTask(id,task){return axios.put(apiUrl+"/"+id,task);}export function deleteTask(id){return axios.delete(apiUrl+"/"+id);}
